Subject: Unfortunate but required rebuke
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=140463140
X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

I know you've heard Polar Claw's ranting and that you might not 
agree with the fact that there can be too much posting. But let's 
face, it took me half an hour to go through all messages. There is a 
problem, but nothing that we can't repair.

Here are some suggestions:

- Go through all messages before you start to reply.

- Reply only once with each character, but try to incorporate a 
reply to every character he talked to.

- try to keep your posting time to a reasonable distance when there 
are more than two people involved

- Be mindful of others, please!

This is not something to drag you down, just to help you live with 
each other.
